Step 1: Locating Places

1.            Insert a ‘dot’ to indicate where Shittim and Yerhico are on the map.

2.            Drag each item in the list to the map to label where they are located.

Shittim is located just on the east side of the Jordan River, northeast of the Dead Sea.  It was the place of B’nai Yisrael’s encampment during Moshe’s final days.

The spies headed for Yericho.  Yericho was located in Eretz Cana’an, just west of the Jordan River, northwest of the Dead Sea diagonally opposite Shittim. Yericho was a large and fortified city that had its own king.  Standing on the border, Yericho had to always be on the ready for foreign invasion.
